mapper.select: select * from comm_board where cb_notice=1 and comm_num=#{comm_num}
select commb.* from ( select cb.*, rownum rnum from comm_board cb where comm_num=#{comm_num}) commb where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} order by cb_date desc

select cmcnt, cblcnt, cvcnt, cb from (select nvl(count(distinct commc_num),0) cmcnt from comm_comment where cb_num=#{cb_num}) aa, (select nvl(count(distinct cbl_num),0) cblcnt from comm_board_like where cb_num=#{cb_num}) bb, (select nvl(max(cb_views),0) cvcnt, nvl(max(cb_num),0) cb from comm_board where cb_num=#{cb_num}) cc
